explanation: The stage direction indicates a colporteur (a street vendor) shouting outside, which relates to the delivery of his speech. It reflects vocal expression and the manner in which the character expresses the urgency of the announcement regarding the lottery. This fits the category of delivery, especially considering the emphasis on the call and the information being communicated.
stgdir: On entend un colporteur qui crie en dehors : « C'est aujourd'hui la Loterie Nationale de France ; qu'est-ce qui veut le gros lot ? 955 francs pour 24 sols.»
